entries.imp_17: Get out of here REBEL SCUM!
entries.imp_16: Are you ready to perform a mission now?
entries.imp_15: No, our stormtroopers are handpicked, but you could be a pilot, or a soldier, or whatever else you wanted. You could drive an AT-AT even.
entries.imp_14: Come back when you're ready for a mission.
entries.imp_13: Perhaps you'd better just move along then.
entries.imp_12: I think I know everything I need to know.
entries.imp_10: Yes, please, that would be great.
entries.imp_8: We fight the rebel scum all through the galaxy.
entries.imp_4: Do you have any questions about anything?
entries.imp_1: Hello.  My name is Prefect Talmont.  Would you like to join the Empire?
